snippet: A new study may help to give these feared but important predators a better chance of surviving.
abstract: Editorial cites research that for the first time observes homing behavior among female lemon sharks, showing they return faithfully to same nurseries every year to give birth; expresses hope that study will help give the feared but important predators a better chance of survival.
lead_paragraph: A new study may help to give these feared but important predators a better chance of surviving.
